publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3598 Robin Harper: Welcome Barnardo’s Scotland to the Parliament—That the Parliament welcomes the Barnardo’s Scotland stall which will be in the Garden Lobby of the Parliament for the week beginning 21 November 2005; recognises that the stall will be highlighting the organisation’s 62 children’s services, which support almost 10,000 of Scotland’s most vulnerable and disadvantaged children and families in overcoming challenges, including sexual abuse, exclusion from school, HIV/AIDS, leaving care, substance misuse, disabilities, mental health issues and social exclusion, and notes that representatives of Barnardo’s Tayside Domestic Abuse Initiative, Glasgow Street Team and Fighting Against Child Exploitation (FACE) services will be present on the stall to discuss their work.

S2M-3598 Robin Harper: Welcome Barnardo’s Scotland to the Parliament—That the Parliament welcomes the Barnardo’s Scotland stall which will be in the Garden Lobby of the Parliament for the week beginning 21 November 2005; recognises that the stall will be highlighting the organisation’s 62 children’s services, which support almost 10,000 of Scotland’s most vulnerable and disadvantaged children and families in overcoming challenges, including sexual abuse, exclusion from school, HIV/AIDS, leaving care, substance misuse, disabilities, mental health issues and social exclusion, and notes that representatives of Barnardo’s Tayside Domestic Abuse Initiative, Glasgow Street Team and Fighting Against Child Exploitation (FACE) services will be present on the stall to discuss their work.Supported by: Mr David Davidson*
S2M-3598 Welcome Barnardo’s Scotland to the Parliament (lodged on 17 November 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3598 Welcome Barnardo’s Scotland to the Parliament (lodged on 17 November 2005) Mike Pringle*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3598 Welcome Barnardo’s Scotland to the Parliament (lodged on 17 November 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3598 Welcome Barnardo’s Scotland to the Parliament (lodged on 17 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
